ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description:
Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Animals Logic - Genetic Rim - GiddyUP Core - GiddyUp RideAndRoll - Path Avoid - Power Switch - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Toggle Refuelable - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming
Partial Support: - Simple Sidearms
